course_description: Provides an introduction to the basic scientific epidemiologic, economic, programmatic, and political aspects of vaccines and immunization. Emphases immunizations in the developing world, with examples also drawn from US experience. Cross-listed with EPI 566.
schedule_location: F 10am-11:50am in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R226
